description: Create, change and delete boards and cards

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: The MIME type of the attachment to add

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the attachment to add

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a new attachment for a card

properties.name: Delete
properties.description: Delete an attachment

properties.name: Get
properties.description: Get the data of an attachment

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Returns many attachments for the card

properties.name: description
properties.description: The description of the board

properties.name: prefs_background
properties.description: The ID of a custom background or one of: blue, orange, green, red, purple, pink, lime, sky, grey

properties.name: prefs_cardCovers
properties.description: Whether card covers are enabled

properties.name: keepFromSource
properties.description: To keep cards from the original board pass in the value cards

properties.name: defaultLabels
properties.description: Whether to use the default set of labels

properties.name: defaultLists
properties.description: Whether to add the default set of lists to a board(To Do, Doing, Done).It is ignored if idBoardSource is provided

properties.name: idOrganization
properties.description: The ID or name of the team the board should belong to

properties.name: prefs_selfJoin
properties.description: Whether users can join the boards themselves or whether they have to be invited

properties.name: idBoardSource
properties.description: The ID of a board to copy into the new board

properties.name: pluginData
properties.description: Whether to include pluginData on the card with the response

properties.name: updateFields
properties.description: Whether the board is closed

properties.name: desc
properties.description: New description of the board

properties.name: subscribed
properties.description: Whether the acting user is subscribed to the board

properties.name: Update
properties.description: Update a board

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: idMember
properties.description: The ID of the member to add to the board

properties.name: type
properties.description: Invite as normal member

properties.name: Admin
properties.description: Invite as admin

properties.name: Observer
properties.description: Invite as observer (Trello premium feature)

properties.name: email
properties.description: The ID of the board to update

properties.name: fullName
properties.description: The full name of the user to add as a member of the board. Must have a length of at least 1 and cannot begin nor end with a space.

properties.name: Invite
properties.description: Invite a new member to a board via email

properties.name: Remove
properties.description: Remove member from board using member ID

properties.name: listId
properties.description: The ID of the list to create card in

properties.name: dueComplete
properties.description: Whether the card is completed

properties.name: pos
properties.description: The position of the new card. top, bottom, or a positive float.

properties.name: idMembers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of member IDs to add to the card

properties.name: idLabels
properties.description: Comma-separated list of label IDs to add to the card

properties.name: urlSource
properties.description: A source URL to attach to card

properties.name: idCardSource
properties.description: The ID of a card to copy into the new card

properties.name: board
properties.description: Whether to return the board object the card is on

properties.name: board_fields
properties.description: Fields to return. Either "all" or a comma-separated list: name, desc, descData, closed, idOrganization, pinned, url, prefs.

properties.name: customFieldItems
properties.description: Whether to include the customFieldItems

properties.name: members
properties.description: Whether to return member objects for members on the card

properties.name: member_fields
properties.description: Fields to return. Either "all" or a comma-separated list: avatarHash, fullName, initials, username.

properties.name: stickers
properties.description: Whether to include sticker models with the response

properties.name: sticker_fields
properties.description: Fields to return. Either "all" or a comma-separated list of sticker fields.

properties.name: idBoard
properties.description: The ID of the board the card should be on

properties.name: closed
properties.description: Whether the board is closed

properties.name: due
properties.description: A due date for the card

properties.name: idList
properties.description: The ID of the list the card should be in

properties.name: text
properties.description: The ID of the card

properties.name: checklistId
properties.description: The ID of the checklist to update

properties.name: checkItemId
properties.description: The ID of the checklist item to delete

properties.name: Create Checklist Item
properties.description: Create a checklist item

properties.name: Delete Checklist Item
properties.description: Delete a checklist item

properties.name: Get Checklist Items
properties.description: Get a specific checklist on a card

properties.name: Get Completed Checklist Items
properties.description: Get the completed checklist items on a card

properties.name: Update Checklist Item
properties.description: Update an item in a checklist on a card

properties.name: boardId
properties.description: The ID of the board

properties.name: Create
properties.description: Create a new label

properties.name: Remove From Card
properties.description: Remove a label from a card

properties.name: archive
properties.description: Whether the list should be archived or unarchived

properties.name: Get Cards
properties.description: Get all the cards in a list
